original_title: Litro to revise LP Gas prices on Friday (4)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas said that the LP Gas Prices in the World Market have increased.
Litro Gas Chairman Muditha Peiris said that with the price hike in the World Market, local LP Gas prices will be revised and the announcement will be made on Friday (4).
The Chairman of Litro Gas said a MT of LP Gas is sold for over US $ 87 in the world market.
Sri Lanka's LP Gas prices are revised monthly, as per the world market prices.
